A Dart for Every Man.name: A Dart for Every Man
A Dart for Every Man.description: It reads 'In honor of the Faufreluches â€” a dart for every man and for every man a dart.' No matter how often the schematics are modified, this inscription is always preserved.
A Dart for Every Man.how_to_obtain: Deep Desert Drop, crafting with unique schematic

Abulurd's Rapture.name: Abulurd's Rapture
Abulurd's Rapture.description: This Unique disruptor has been modified to spray doubleshots of heavy darts at a slower rate. The name is based on a popular joke that House Rabban soldiers like to tell each other.
Abulurd's Rapture.how_to_obtain: Deep Desert Drop, crafting with unique schematic

Adept Disruptor M11.name: Adept Disruptor M11
Adept Disruptor M11.description: As the Holtzman Effect is impervious to fast moving ballistics, Disruptors instead fire darts of variable velocities in order to find the right speed to penetrate the shield.
Adept Disruptor M11.how_to_obtain: Crafting, Small Falling Shipwrecks in Hagga Basin (Tier 5, Qty 1-3, Probability 4.47%) and Deep Desert (Tier 6, Qty 1-3, Probability 4.47%)

Adept Disruptor Pistol.name: Adept Disruptor Pistol
Adept Disruptor Pistol.description: This Unique heavy pistol borrows technology from the fast-firing disruptor submachine gun, while adding a charging mechanism to fire a burst of darts in quick succession.
Adept Disruptor Pistol.how_to_obtain: Crafting with unique schematic, unlocks a Bene Gesserit Capstone Skill

Adept Maula Pistol.name: Adept Maula Pistol
Adept Maula Pistol.description: Lightweight but with a short range, the Maula Pistol is a reliable sidearm.
Adept Maula Pistol.how_to_obtain: Crafting, purchase from Landsraad Weapons Vendor for 13,500, Small Falling Shipwrecks in Hagga Basin (Tier 5, Qty 1-3, Probability 4.47%) and Deep Desert (Tier 6, Qty 1-3, Probability 4.47%)

Adept Rafiq Snubnose.name: Adept Rafiq Snubnose
Adept Rafiq Snubnose.description: There is a Rafiq Snubnose Pistol in the cabinet by the bed of Count Daran of Ishkal. His wife is unaware and would disapprove.
Adept Rafiq Snubnose.how_to_obtain: Crafting, purchase from Landsraad Weapons Vendor for 14,500

Artisan Disruptor M11.description: As the Holtzman Effect is impervious to fast moving ballistics, Disruptors instead fire darts of variable velocities in order to find the right speed to penetrate the shield.
Artisan Disruptor M11.how_to_obtain: Crafting, Small Falling Shipwrecks in Hagga Basin (Tier 3, Qty 1-3, Probability 4.92%)

Cope.name: Cope
Cope.description: This Unique pistol comes with increased accuracy and bonus damage for headshots, but with a low capacity clip.

House Disruptor M11.description: As the Holtzman Effect is impervious to fast moving ballistics, Disruptors instead fire darts of variable velocities in order to find the right speed to penetrate the shield.

House Maula Pistol.description: Lightweight but with a short range, the Maula Pistol is a reliable sidearm.

Standard Disruptor M11.name: Standard Disruptor M11
Standard Disruptor M11.description: As the Holtzman Effect is impervious to fast moving ballistics, Disruptors instead fire darts of variable velocities in order to find the right speed to penetrate the shield.
Standard Disruptor M11.how_to_obtain: Crafting, purchase from Ant Nostrum for 3,300, Small Falling Shipwrecks in Hagga Basin (Tier 2, Qty 1-3, Probability 4.76%)

Standard Maula Pistol.name: Standard Maula Pistol
Standard Maula Pistol.description: Redesigned from the ground up, the MK ll is a must-have for successful underworld kingpins. Or so they are reputed to be.
Standard Maula Pistol.how_to_obtain: Crafting, purchase from Ant Nostrum for 3,300, Small Falling Shipwrecks in Hagga Basin (Tier 2, Qty 1-3, Probability 4.76%)

Standard Rafiq Snubnose.name: Standard Rafiq Snubnose
Standard Rafiq Snubnose.description: There is a Rafiq Snubnose Pistol in the cabinet by the bed of Count Daran of Ishkal. His wife is unaware and would disapprove.
Standard Rafiq Snubnose.how_to_obtain: Crafting, Small Falling Shipwrecks in Hagga Basin (Tier 2, Qty 1-3, Probability 4.76%)

Way of the Fallen.name: Way of the Fallen
Way of the Fallen.description: This Unique Maula pistol has a modified spring mechanism that automatically reloads darts without releasing trigger pressure.

Arhun K-28 Lasgun.name: Arhun K-28 Lasgun
Arhun K-28 Lasgun.description: The Arhun K-28 Lasgun is a powerful anti-vehicle weapon that fires a continuous laser beam, but shuts off if aimed at shielded targets to prevent nuclear explosion.

Bashar's Command.name: Bashar's Command
Bashar's Command.description: A unique missile launcher with enhanced guidance system for better accuracy against moving targets.

Black Market K-28 Lasgun.name: Black Market K-28 Lasgun
Black Market K-28 Lasgun.description: A modified Lasgun sold on the black market, with disabled safety features for shooting shielded targets, risking explosion.

Experimental Vulcan GAU-94.name: Experimental Vulcan GAU-94
Experimental Vulcan GAU-94.description: An experimental minigun with high rate of fire, but prone to overheating.

Extravagant Message.name: Extravagant Message
Extravagant Message.description: A unique rocket launcher that fires explosive missiles with a message engraved on them.

House Vulcan GAU-92.name: House Vulcan GAU-92
House Vulcan GAU-92.description: A heavy minigun used by House troops for suppressing fire.

Plasma Cannon.name: Plasma Cannon
Plasma Cannon.description: Fires plasma-charged shots that explode on impact.

Regis Missile Launcher.name: Regis Missile Launcher
Regis Missile Launcher.description: A high-tier missile launcher for anti-vehicle and anti-structure use.

Regis Vulcan GAU-92.name: Regis Vulcan GAU-92
Regis Vulcan GAU-92.description: The ultimate minigun for maximum firepower.

Shaitan's Tongue.name: Shaitan's Tongue
Shaitan's Tongue.description: A flamethrower that spews flames to burn enemies.

The Ancient Way.name: The Ancient Way
The Ancient Way.description: An ancient Lasgun with enhanced power, ignoring some safety protocols.

Adept Burst Drillshot.name: Adept Burst Drillshot
Adept Burst Drillshot.description: A unique scattergun that fires bursts of drillshots for close-quarters combat.

Adept Drillshot FK7.name: Adept Drillshot FK7
Adept Drillshot FK7.description: A scattergun that fires drillshots for shredding enemies at close range.

Adept GRDA 44.name: Adept GRDA 44
Adept GRDA 44.description: A scattergun with a large clip for sustained fire in close quarters.

House Drillshot FK7.name: House Drillshot FK7
House Drillshot FK7.description: House version of the drillshot scattergun.

House GRDA 44.name: House GRDA 44
House GRDA 44.description: House version of the GRDA 44 scattergun.

Adept Dirk.name: Adept Dirk
Adept Dirk.description: A short blade for quick strikes.

Adept Kindjal.name: Adept Kindjal
Adept Kindjal.description: A common personal weapon popular among the family members of this House.

Basic Dirk.name: Basic Dirk
Basic Dirk.description: A basic short blade for self-defense.

House Dirk.name: House Dirk
House Dirk.description: House version of the dirk short blade.

Adept JABAL Spitdart.name: Adept JABAL Spitdart
Adept JABAL Spitdart.description: A rifle that fires poison darts for long-range engagements.

Adept Karpov 38.name: Adept Karpov 38
Adept Karpov 38.description: A burst-fire rifle for controlled shots.
Adept Karpov 38.how_to_obtain: Crafting, purchase from Landsraad Weapons Vendor for 16,500

Aren's Vengeance.name: Aren's Vengeance
Aren's Vengeance.description: A unique rifle with increased damage against shielded targets.

House JABAL Spitdart.name: House JABAL Spitdart
House JABAL Spitdart.description: House version of the poison dart rifle.

House Karpov 38 (Weapons).name: House Karpov 38
House Karpov 38 (Weapons).description: House version of the burst-fire rifle.

Adept Rapier.name: Adept Rapier
Adept Rapier.description: A longer sword used for self-defense. Can penetrate shields.
Adept Rapier.how_to_obtain: Crafting, purchase from Landsraad Weapons Vendor for 8,000

Adept Sword.name: Adept Sword
Adept Sword.description: The sword is longer and heavier than a kindjal, but utilizes similar techniques.

Standard Sword (Weapons).name: Standard Sword
Standard Sword (Weapons).description: The sword is longer and heavier than a kindjal, but utilizes similar techniques.

Adept Vulcan GAU-92.name: Adept Vulcan GAU-92
Adept Vulcan GAU-92.description: A heavy minigun for suppressing fire.
Adept Vulcan GAU-92.how_to_obtain: Crafting, purchase from Landsraad Weapons Vendor for 19,500

Crysknife.name: Crysknife
Crysknife.description: The Crysknife is made from a sandworm's tooth and is very brittle.
Crysknife.how_to_obtain: Complete the Trial of Aql, Deep Desert
